Armors.name: Leather Armor
Armors.Description: A basic armor made of leather. It provides some protection, but not much.

Armors.name: Iron Armor
Armors.Description: A basic armor made of iron. It provides good protection, but is heavy and cumbersome.

Armors.name: Steel Armor
Armors.Description: A basic armor made of steel. It provides excellent protection, but is heavy and cumbersome.

Armors.Description: A basic helmet made of iron. It provides good protection, but is heavy and cumbersome.

Armors.name: Steel Helmet
Armors.Description: A basic helmet made of steel. It provides excellent protection, but is heavy and cumbersome.

Armors.name: Leather Boots
